Eliminate the calamities and difficulties of yakshas, rakshasas, and other ghosts and spirits.
World-Honored One, if a mantra practitioner
Wants to go to sleep, burn incense in front of the image,
Recite it twenty-one times, and then lie down.
I will quickly appear in that person's dream
And tell them everything about the past, present, and future.
Enable them to attain perfect knowledge and merit,
And eliminate all calamities, strange illnesses, and afflictions.

They will be reborn in a lotus flower, with a perfect consciousness,
And attain the knowledge of past lives.
The Tathagatas will give them predictions
And they will attain a vajra body.
They will dwell in the mandala assemblies of the Tathagatas' families
And, until unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, will never regress.
